name: C-Beam Survivors
description:
Captain a spaceship sent to rescue survivors from a large space battle in a shoot 'em up (shmup) game with a touch of satire.

Made by Drew Moger in Construct 3.

In-game music: "Space" by Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov (from https://opengameart.org/content/space-1)

Explosion sound: "Torpedo Explosion" by Partners In Rhyme from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-track/torpedo-explosion-466457/

Collision sound: "Explosion 1" by Partners In Rhyme from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-track/explosion-1-466446/

Public Domain Credit (just to be nice):

Main menu music: "Background Space Track" by yd from https://opengameart.org/content/background-space-track

Ship art: "Modular Ships" by surt from https://opengameart.org/content/modular-ships
